title: Participants in paintball in the U.S. from 2006 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of participants in millions has decreased over the Year.
Number of participants in millions is gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Number of participants in millions, about 4.86 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Number of participants in millions, of value 3.44 was reported at Year 2014
